segments.text: I can't believe what's happening in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's left on, and the sink is overflowing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading down the front, ruining the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is just standing there, oblivious, drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water or feel the puddle at her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's so irresponsible; the floor's slippery now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kids are sneaking cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on an unstable stool, one wrong move and he'll fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's helping him, hand outstretched for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should be watching them, not lost in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks perfect, mocking the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes me so frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to snap out of it before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope no one gets hurt in this carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR
